What specific branding guidelines (logo, corporate colors, fonts) should override the proposed design system? The business brief does not specify brand standards.

Should the dashboard screenshots/simulations use real production data visuals (anonymized) or fully fictional illustrative data? Compliance notes prohibit data export but do not clarify use of realistic screenshots in training.
Is there a preferred interaction library or LMS platform that constrains which interaction types (drag-and-drop, Lottie animation) are technically feasible?
Should the completion badge and certificate be integrated with an existing LMS credentialing system, or is this a standalone visual?
Are there any existing production line sensor dashboard screenshots or UI mockups available to use as reference for the simulated dashboard visuals, or should all visuals be created from scratch?
